entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:33 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:33 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
